mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hill, J. S.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 25 1861. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 25 1861. Three men Wilkinson Brown & Huff of Wirt County with others are arrested by citizens who demand their removal as dangerous to the public peace I hold them subject to your order their lives are threatened if released answer Capt J. S. Hill 39W127col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hill, J. S.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
